publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4945 Ross Finnie: Praises St John’s Primary School—That the Parliament praises St John’s Primary School in Port Glasgow for its wonderful HM Inspectorate of Education report; notes that St John’s received three good ratings and two very good ratings, and further notes that the children’s behaviour and the head teacher’s commitment to improving the quality of the children’s learning were particularly praised in the report.
S3M-4945 Praises St John’s Primary School (lodged on 28 September 2009) Jim Hume*, Bill Wilson*, Jim Tolson*, Karen Whitefield*

S3M-4945 Ross Finnie: Praises St John’s Primary School—That the Parliament praises St John’s Primary School in Port Glasgow for its wonderful HM Inspectorate of Education report; notes that St John’s received three good ratings and two very good ratings, and further notes that the children’s behaviour and the head teacher’s commitment to improving the quality of the children’s learning were particularly praised in the report. Supported by: Jim Hume, Bill Wilson, Jim Tolson, Karen Whitefield
S3M-4945 Praises St John’s Primary School (lodged on 28 September 2009) Gil Paterson*
